short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the current stock prices and details.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Live Stock Prices is a powerful and easy-to-use Chrome extension designed for stock market enthusiasts, investors, and traders. With this extension, you can quickly and conveniently access the latest stock prices and key financial data for your favorite stocks without leaving your browser.

Key Features:
• Real-Time Data: Get live updates on stock prices for various companies.
• Comprehensive Details: View essential stock information including open, high, low, close, volume, previous close, change, and change percentage.
• User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design makes it easy to navigate and use.
• Quick Search: Simply enter the stock code to fetch the latest data instantly.
• Compact Design: Minimalistic layout ensures the information is presented clearly and concisely.
• Support: Easy access to support and resources for any assistance you might need.
• Whether you're keeping an eye on your investments or analyzing potential trades, Live Stock Prices provides the data you need, right when you need it.

How to Use:
• Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
• Click on the extension icon to open the popup.
• Enter the stock code (e.g., NVDA) and press Enter or click the Fetch Data button.
• View the real-time stock prices and details.

Stay ahead in the market with Live Stock Prices – your go-to tool for real-time stock data!
